name: snow bloom faux fur coat
notes:
buttery soft and ridiculously cosy, the snow bloom coat uses easy crochet stitches (only half double crochets) and simple shapes to create a timeless winter coat! made from a luxurious faux fur yarn, this stylish crochet coat is a quick and chunky make that’s perfect for the chilly winter months! 

the snow bloom jacket has wide straight sleeves with a boxy body and chunky collar. these simple design features create a jacket / coat / sweater that is incredibly versatile and so ridiculously comfy you’ll never want to take it off! elevate your outfits with this gorgeous faux fur coat (this crochet pattern is a great christmas jacket!) or dress it down with a pair of jeans and ankle boots for a more casual look. this cosy faux fur sweater is so soft that you can even wear it around the house! 


sizes: xs(s, m, l, xl)(2xl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl)

skill level: easy

this crochet pattern is written in us terms with photos.
